I know the OutOfMemory problem was there mentioned�many times, but i could not find any topic that can solve my problem.
I am working on crawling whole czech domain. I have got list of 220 000 seeds (2.level domains) and I do it by SurtPrefixScope.

900 MHz PIII
4GB RAM
4GB swap
Debian Linux
32b JVM
I started java with JAVA_OPTS=" -Xms1500m -Xmx1500m -Xss512k".
But after few hours i have got alerts with OOM exceptions and crawl stoped. I set 5 toethreads and I hope the crawl will go on without errors.
If it will be necessary I will copy my order file.
